elements: Cunning may answer Strength, Strength may answer Cunning, but Agony finds no answer.
I might find safety there for a little longer... if they don't get there first.
Don't attract attention. [When all these are gone, you'll gain an Obscurity, unless there are any Traces on the board. Then the cycle will begin again.]
This might be the only defence against the stopper lords. It might be no defence at all. [If this reaches seven, you've found sufficient safety to win.]
Ten years of generously donated life.
A year of generously donated life.
A betraying clue that your pursuers might recognise.
One of those few cities which has the same name in every History... if you believe that sort of thing.
Some there are who will not yield. Perhaps this is a virtue.
